levelName: 英文單字認讀基礎級(五)

examples.english: My dad has a new blue car.
examples.chinese: 我爸爸有一輛新的藍色汽車。

examples.english: The red car is going very fast now.
examples.chinese: 那輛紅色汽車現在開得很快。

examples.english: We are riding in the car to school.
examples.chinese: 我們正在搭汽車去學校。

examples.english: My mom bought me a beautiful pink bike.
examples.chinese: 我媽媽買給我一輛漂亮的粉紅色腳踏車。

examples.english: The boy is riding his new bike around the park.
examples.chinese: 那個男孩正在公園裡騎他的新腳踏車。

examples.english: Riding a bike is good exercise for us.
examples.chinese: 騎腳踏車對我們來說是很好的運動。

examples.english: My brother is riding his new red bicycle very fast now.
examples.chinese: 我的哥哥現在正騎著他那輛全新的紅色腳踏車，速度很快。

examples.english: Look! My dad is cleaning his shiny blue bicycle in the yard.
examples.chinese: 看！我的爸爸正在院子裡擦拭他那輛閃亮的藍色腳踏車。

examples.english: Many students are parking their bicycles neatly outside the school.
examples.chinese: 許多學生正把他們的腳踏車整齊地停放在學校外面。

examples.english: The man is waiting for a yellow taxi at the corner.
examples.chinese: 那個男人正在街角等一輛黃色的計程車。

examples.english: A big taxi is driving very fast down the street now.
examples.chinese: 一輛大型計程車現在正快速地開在街上。

examples.english: My friend is taking a taxi to the zoo with her family.
examples.chinese: 我的朋友正和她的家人搭計程車去動物園。

examples.english: The red train is arriving at the station now.
examples.chinese: 紅色的火車現在正在抵達車站。

examples.english: She is waiting for the train to go home.
examples.chinese: 她正在等火車回家。

examples.english: Look! The train is going into a dark tunnel.
examples.chinese: 看！火車正在駛入一個黑暗的隧道。

examples.english: A big blue ship is sailing slowly on the ocean today.
examples.chinese: 一艘很大的藍色船今天正在海上緩慢航行。

examples.english: That large ship is carrying many heavy boxes now.
examples.chinese: 那艘大船現在正載著許多很重的箱子。

examples.english: Look! A passenger ship is bringing many tourists to the island.
examples.chinese: 看！一艘客船正載著許多觀光客到島上。

examples.english: My dad is calling his friend on the phone right now.
examples.chinese: 我爸爸現在正在打電話給他的朋友。

examples.english: Mom is calling us home for dinner now.
examples.chinese: 媽媽現在正在叫我們回家吃晚餐。

examples.english: We are calling our new baby cat "Mimi".
examples.chinese: 我們正在把我們的新小貓叫做「咪咪」。

examples.english: The girl is slowly opening the window for fresh air.
examples.chinese: 那個女孩正在慢慢地打開窗戶，讓新鮮空氣進來。

examples.english: The boy is carefully opening his new storybook now.
examples.chinese: 這個男孩現在正小心地打開他的新故事書。

examples.english: My friends are excitedly opening their birthday presents.
examples.chinese: 我的朋友們正在興奮地打開他們的生日禮物。

examples.english: The boy is closing the door very quietly.
examples.chinese: 男孩正在非常安靜地關上門。

examples.english: My sister is closing her laptop after finishing homework.
examples.chinese: 我的妹妹在寫完功課後正在關上她的筆記型電腦。

examples.english: The shop owner is closing the store early today.
examples.chinese: 店主今天正在提早關上商店。

examples.english: I am seeing a cute little cat in the garden.
examples.chinese: 我正在花園裡看到一隻可愛的小貓。

examples.english: We are seeing a funny cartoon on TV right now.
examples.chinese: 我們現在正在電視上看一部有趣的卡通片。

examples.english: She is seeing her grandmother at the hospital today.
examples.chinese: 她今天正在醫院看她的奶奶。

examples.english: The students are looking at the beautiful butterfly in the garden.
examples.chinese: 學生們正在花園裡看那隻美麗的蝴蝶。

examples.english: My little brother is looking sleepy after his long nap.
examples.chinese: 我弟弟睡了長長的午覺後，看起來很睏。

examples.english: She is looking for her red umbrella because it is raining outside.
examples.chinese: 她正在找她的紅色雨傘，因為外面正在下雨。

examples.english: We are watching a fun cartoon right now.
examples.chinese: 我們現在正在看一個有趣的卡通。

examples.english: The children are watching the monkeys play at the zoo.
examples.chinese: 孩子們正在動物園看猴子玩耍。

examples.english: My sister is watching our mom bake a delicious cake.
examples.chinese: 我姐姐正在看媽媽烤一個美味的蛋糕。

examples.english: My dad is standing tall and strong.
examples.chinese: 我的爸爸站得又高又壯。

examples.english: That tall tree is shading our whole house.
examples.chinese: 那棵高大的樹正在遮蔽我們的整個房子。

examples.english: The new skyscraper is looking extremely tall in the city.
examples.chinese: 這棟新的摩天大樓在城市裡看起來非常高。

examples.english: The snake is moving with its long body.
examples.chinese: 那條蛇正用牠長長的身體移動著。

examples.english: We are taking a long time to finish our homework.
examples.chinese: 我們正在花很長的時間完成作業。

examples.english: The teacher is drawing a very long line on the board.
examples.chinese: 老師正在黑板上畫一條很長的線。

examples.english: My friend Lily is short, but she runs fast.
examples.chinese: 我的朋友莉莉很矮，但是她跑得很快。

examples.english: My teacher has short hair and big eyes.
examples.chinese: 我的老師有短頭髮和大眼睛。

examples.english: Our break time is short, so we play quickly.
examples.chinese: 我們的下課時間很短，所以我們玩得很快。

examples.english: The elephant is walking with its big ears.
examples.chinese: 這隻大象正用牠的大耳朵走路。

examples.english: Today is a big day for my school's sports festival.
examples.chinese: 今天是我學校運動會的一個重要日子。

examples.english: She is eating a big bowl of noodles right now.
examples.chinese: 她現在正在吃一大碗麵。

examples.english: My toy car is very small, but it can run fast.
examples.chinese: 我的玩具車很小，但是它跑得很快。

examples.english: Look! A small bird is eating seeds on the tree branch.
examples.chinese: 看！一隻小鳥正在樹枝上吃種子。

examples.english: Mom is giving me a small piece of cake now for dessert.
examples.chinese: 媽媽現在正在給我一小塊蛋糕當甜點。

examples.english: This ice cream tastes really good.
examples.chinese: 這個冰淇淋嚐起來真好吃。

examples.english: She is a good student and always studies hard.
examples.chinese: 她是一個好學生，而且總是努力學習。

examples.english: Getting enough sleep is good for your body.
examples.chinese: 獲得足夠的睡眠對你的身體很好。

examples.english: The old milk in the refrigerator smells very bad.
examples.chinese: 冰箱裡面的舊牛奶聞起來很壞。

examples.english: Eating too much candy is bad for your teeth.
examples.chinese: 吃太多糖對你的牙齒很壞。

examples.english: It is bad to tell lies to your friends.
examples.chinese: 對你的朋友說謊是很壞的。

examples.english: Our teacher is being nice and patient with all of us.
examples.chinese: 我們的老師現在對我們所有人都很親切也很有耐心。

examples.english: We are having a nice picnic by the river right now.
examples.chinese: 我們現在正在河邊享受美好的野餐。

examples.english: My sister is wearing a very nice new dress today.
examples.chinese: 我的姐姐今天穿著一件非常漂亮的新洋裝。

examples.english: She is happy because she got a new toy.
examples.chinese: 她很高興，因為她得到了一個新玩具。

examples.english: The children are looking very happy in the park today.
examples.chinese: 孩子們今天在公園裡看起來非常快樂。

examples.english: We are having a happy time at the party.
examples.chinese: 我們在派對上度過了一段快樂的時光。

examples.english: I am sad because my pet dog is sick.
examples.chinese: 我很傷心，因為我的寵物狗生病了。

examples.english: She is feeling sad because her favorite toy broke.
examples.chinese: 她現在感到傷心，因為她最喜歡的玩具壞掉了。

examples.english: It is a sad story about a lonely puppy looking for a home.
examples.chinese: 這是一個關於一隻孤單小狗尋找家的傷心故事。

examples.english: The cat is getting fat because it eats too much.
examples.chinese: 這隻貓咪越來越胖，因為牠吃太多了。

examples.english: You should not eat too much fat meat.
examples.chinese: 你不應該吃太多肥肉。

examples.english: Santa Claus is a fat and jolly man.
examples.chinese: 聖誕老公公是一位又胖又快樂的人。

examples.english: The girl is very thin because she loves to dance.
examples.chinese: 這個女孩很瘦，因為她喜歡跳舞。

examples.english: This piece of paper is very thin and easy to tear.
examples.chinese: 這張紙很薄，很容易撕破。

examples.english: The soup tastes a little thin, so let's add some noodles.
examples.chinese: 這湯喝起來有點稀，所以我們加一些麵條吧。

examples.english: The strong boy is lifting heavy boxes.
examples.chinese: 這個強壯的男孩正在搬運沉重的箱子。

examples.english: The strong bridge is connecting two sides of the river.
examples.chinese: 這座堅固的橋樑正在連接河的兩岸。

examples.english: A strong wind is blowing the leaves right now.
examples.chinese: 一陣強勁的風正在吹動樹葉。

examples.english: Look! The baby panda is very cute as it eats bamboo.紅！那隻貓熊寶寶在吃竹子時非常可愛。
Look at that little girl; she is wearing a very cute hat.看那個小女孩；她正戴著一頂非常可愛的帽子。
My baby brother is making a cute face for the camera now.我的小弟弟現在正在對著鏡頭擺出一個可愛的表情。
I am feeling sick now, so I need to rest.
examples.chinese: 我現在感到很不舒服，所以需要休息。

examples.english: My little sister is sick and has a high fever today.
examples.chinese: 我的小妹妹生病了，今天發高燒。

examples.english: My friend is getting sick because he played in the rain.
examples.chinese: 我的朋友因為淋雨正在生病。

examples.english: The children are tired from playing outside.
examples.chinese: 孩子們在外面玩耍後很疲倦。

examples.english: I am tired now and need to take a nap.
examples.chinese: 我現在很疲倦，需要小睡一下。

examples.english: This long math problem is making me tired.
examples.chinese: 這個很長的數學題讓我感到疲倦。

examples.english: The teacher is angry with the noisy students.
examples.chinese: 老師對那些吵鬧的學生很生氣。

examples.english: He usually gets angry when he loses games.
examples.chinese: 他輸掉遊戲時通常會生氣。

examples.english: She is angry about her lost pencil case.
examples.chinese: 她對她弄丟的鉛筆盒很生氣。

examples.english: I am very hungry now. I want to eat lunch.
examples.chinese: 我現在很餓。我想吃午餐。

examples.english: After playing outside, the children are very hungry.
examples.chinese: 在外面玩耍後，孩子們都好餓。

examples.english: The yummy smell of cookies is making me hungry.
examples.chinese: 餅乾的美味香味讓我肚子餓了。

examples.english: I am thirsty, so I want to drink some water right now.
examples.chinese: 我現在很渴，所以想喝一些水。

examples.english: After playing basketball, the boys were very thirsty.
examples.chinese: 打完籃球後，那些男孩們都非常口渴。

examples.english: It's so hot today! I am thirsty for a cold juice.
examples.chinese: 今天好熱喔！我很想喝一杯冰涼的果汁。

examples.english: My kind aunt is cooking a big dinner in the kitchen now.
examples.chinese: 我的親切阿姨現在正在廚房煮一頓豐盛的晚餐。

examples.english: Our helpful aunt is teaching me how to draw a cute cat.
examples.chinese: 我們樂於助人的阿姨正在教我如何畫一隻可愛的貓咪。

examples.english: The friendly aunt at the bakery is helping customers choose cakes.
examples.chinese: 烘焙坊裡那位友善的阿姨正在幫助顧客挑選蛋糕。

examples.english: My uncle is now teaching me how to ride a bike.
examples.chinese: 我的叔叔現在正在教我怎麼騎腳踏車。

examples.english: Our friendly uncle is smiling and waving at us.
examples.chinese: 我們友善的叔叔正在對我們微笑和揮手。

examples.english: My uncle is cooking delicious noodles for dinner tonight.
examples.chinese: 我的叔叔今晚正在煮美味的麵條當晚餐。

examples.english: My cousin is playing basketball in the park.
examples.chinese: 我的堂/表兄弟姊妹正在公園打籃球。

examples.english: My cousin has a very cool red bike.
examples.chinese: 我的堂/表兄弟姊妹有一輛很酷的紅色腳踏車。

examples.english: My cousin and I are watching a funny movie.
examples.chinese: 我和我的堂/表兄弟姊妹正在看一部有趣的電影。

examples.english: My parent is reading an interesting story to me now.
examples.chinese: 我的父(母)親現在正在讀一個有趣的故事給我聽。

examples.english: My parents are happily planting flowers in the garden.
examples.chinese: 我的父母親正在高興地在花園裡種花。

examples.english: A kind parent is helping their child with homework right now.
examples.chinese: 一位親切的父(母)親現在正在幫助孩子寫功課。

examples.english: My family is eating dinner together now.
examples.chinese: 我的家人現在正在一起吃晚餐。

examples.english: My family members always take care of each other.
examples.chinese: 我的家人總是互相照顧。

examples.english: Our family loves to spend time together.
examples.chinese: 我們家喜歡一起度過時光。

examples.english: My family is living in a big house now.
examples.chinese: 我的家人現在正住在一棟大房子裡。

examples.english: She is living with her grandparents for the summer.
examples.chinese: 她這個夏天正和祖父母住在一起。

examples.english: We are living happily in our new apartment.
examples.chinese: 我們正快樂地住在我們的新公寓裡。

examples.english: My mother is preparing healthy food for our dinner.
examples.chinese: 我的媽媽正在為我們的晚餐準備健康的食物。

examples.english: The children are enjoying tasty fast food at the restaurant.
examples.chinese: 孩子們正在餐廳裡享用美味的速食。

examples.english: The animals in the zoo are waiting for their food.
examples.chinese: 動物園裡的動物們正在等待牠們的食物。

examples.english: My mom is cooking delicious beef for dinner tonight.
examples.chinese: 我媽媽今晚正在煮美味的牛肉當晚餐。

examples.english: The grilled beef is juicy and tastes really good.
examples.chinese: 這烤牛肉多汁而且嚐起來非常好吃。

examples.english: The children are enjoying their beef burgers at the park.
examples.chinese: 孩子們正在公園裡享用他們的牛肉漢堡。

examples.english: My mom is buying some fresh pork at the market.
examples.chinese: 我媽媽正在市場買一些新鮮的豬肉。

examples.english: Pork is meat that comes from a pig.
examples.chinese: 豬肉是來自豬的肉。

examples.english: We are having delicious pork dumplings for dinner tonight.
examples.chinese: 我們今晚晚餐要吃美味的豬肉水餃。

examples.english: I am drinking a warm bowl of corn soup right now.
examples.chinese: 我現在正在喝一碗熱騰騰的玉米湯。

examples.english: Mom is carefully stirring the thick mushroom soup in the pot.
examples.chinese: 媽媽正在仔細地攪拌鍋裡濃稠的蘑菇湯。

examples.english: My little sister is blowing on her hot chicken soup.
examples.chinese: 我的小妹妹正在吹涼她熱騰騰的雞湯。

examples.english: My brother is eating a big hot dog with mustard right now.
examples.chinese: 我的哥哥現在正在吃一個加了芥末醬的大熱狗。

examples.english: We are buying a yummy hot dog at the store for lunch.
examples.chinese: 我們正在商店買一個美味的熱狗當午餐。

examples.english: She is adding ketchup to her hot dog because she likes it sweet.
examples.chinese: 她正在她的熱狗上加番茄醬，因為她喜歡甜的味道。

examples.english: My little sister is eating a yummy sandwich now.
examples.chinese: 我的小妹妹現在正在吃一個美味的三明治。

examples.english: Dad is putting ham and cheese in the sandwich.
examples.chinese: 爸爸正在把火腿和起司放進三明治裡。

examples.english: He is carefully wrapping his big sandwich for lunch.
examples.chinese: 他正在小心地包裝他的大三明治當午餐。

examples.english: The round red tomato is on the table.
examples.chinese: 圓圓紅紅的番茄在桌上。

examples.english: Dad is cutting a big tomato for our dinner.
examples.chinese: 爸爸正在為我們的晚餐切一個大番茄。

examples.english: I love the sweet taste of a fresh tomato.
examples.chinese: 我喜歡新鮮番茄甜美的味道。

examples.english: The farmer is picking many ripe oranges from the tree.
examples.chinese: 這位農夫正在樹上摘很多成熟的柳橙。

examples.english: I am drawing a picture with a bright orange sun.
examples.chinese: 我正在畫一張有著亮橘色太陽的圖畫。

examples.english: The little bird has pretty orange feathers on its wings.
examples.chinese: 這隻小鳥的翅膀上有著美麗的橘色羽毛。

examples.english: This green vegetable is growing well in the garden.
examples.chinese: 這種綠色的蔬菜在花園裡長得很好。

examples.english: My mom says eating vegetables keeps us strong.
examples.chinese: 我媽媽說吃蔬菜可以讓我們保持強壯。

examples.english: We should eat many different vegetables every day.
examples.chinese: 我們每天都應該吃很多不同的蔬菜。

examples.english: We eat soft bread with milk for a delicious breakfast.
examples.chinese: 我們早餐會吃鬆軟的麵包配牛奶，很美味。

examples.english: She is making a yummy sandwich using two slices of bread.
examples.chinese: 她正在用兩片麵包做一個美味的三明治。

examples.english: There are many kinds of bread, like white bread and whole wheat bread.
examples.chinese: 麵包有很多種，像是白麵包和全麥麵包。

examples.english: My mom is baking a delicious apple pie for dinner now.
examples.chinese: 我媽媽現在正在為晚餐烤一個美味的蘋果派。

examples.english: The strawberry pie looks so yummy with fresh cream on top.
examples.chinese: 這個草莓派上面有鮮奶油，看起來好好吃。

examples.english: My sister is sharing a big slice of pumpkin pie with me.
examples.chinese: 我姐姐正在和我分享一大塊南瓜派。

examples.english: They are eating delicious pizza for dinner right now.
examples.chinese: 他們現在正在吃美味的披薩當晚餐。

examples.english: My mom is making a big cheese pizza for us.
examples.chinese: 我媽媽正在為我們做一個大大的起司披薩。

examples.english: The warm pizza is smelling so good from the kitchen.
examples.chinese: 溫熱的披薩從廚房傳來好香的味道。

examples.english: The little girl is happily eating her strawberry ice cream.
examples.chinese: 小女孩正在開心地吃她的草莓冰淇淋。

examples.english: Many people are enjoying ice cream because the weather is very hot today.
examples.chinese: 很多人正在享用冰淇淋，因為今天天氣非常熱。

examples.english: They are buying a big cup of vanilla ice cream from the shop now.
examples.chinese: 他們現在正在店裡買一大杯香草冰淇淋。

examples.english: My little sister is happily eating a piece of candy right now.
examples.chinese: 我的小妹妹現在正開心地吃著一顆糖果。

examples.english: Mom is carefully wrapping many colorful candies for the party.
examples.chinese: 媽媽正仔細地為派對包裝許多五顏六色的糖果。

examples.english: The children are eagerly waiting for the delicious candy at the store.
examples.chinese: 孩子們正興奮地等待著店裡那些美味的糖果。
